text: [Jod kun az] Hangome ki Alloh taolo [ʙa Iso] farmud: "Ej Iso, man turo ʙarmegiram va ʙa suji xes ʙolo meʙaram va turo az [oloisu tuhmati] kasone, ki kufr varzidand, pok megardonam va to ruzi rastoxez kasonero, ki az tu pajravi kardand [va ʙa Muhammad imon ovardand], ʙartar az kasone qaror mediham, ki kufr varzidand. Sipas ʙozgastaton ʙa suji man ast; on goh dar [mavridi] on ci dar on ixtilof mekarded, mijonaton dovari mekunam
